entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3 except 8 inland.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3 except 8 inland. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle near midnight. Fog patches developing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
